title: Terminal commands
description: An overview of the terminal commands

value.text:
Create user

 

node hashbrown.js create-user u=[username] p=[password] admin=[true/false]

Make user admin

node hashbrown.js make-user-admin u=[username]

Revoke tokens

node hashbrownjs revoke-tokens u=[username]

Set user scopes

node hashbrown.js set-user-scopes u=[username] p=[project] s=[templates,connections,schemas]

Set user password

node hashbrown.js set-user-password u=[username] p=[password]
